entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
